name: Armatelum Showdown Demo 2&3
description:
This version of Armatelum Showdown features the additions of Chapters 2 and 3 to the main story of the visual novel. It also introduces the the Armate Boosters mechanic in the battle system.

A new sport known as "Armatelum" is growing in popularity worldwide. They say it's based of an old fairy tail: a history that was lost to the passage of time. This lost legend gets reawaken when a small boy comes into contact with a magical sword from the forgotten era. Join Nova Starrise AKA Justice Star (J-Star) as he adventures around the new Armatelum themed resort of Bedandera, meeting new faces and uncovering the mystery of the forgotten past.

This Visual Novel - Shoot-Em-Up Hybrid will get you adventuring and building affinity with a cool cast of characters while facing off with wacky villains as you help the people of Bedandera and find out more about a legend that's been forgotten to time. Are you ready to Throwdown a Showdown?
